SELECT hd.domain_id, hd.tenant_id, ht.tenant_num, httl.tenant_name, hd.company_id, hc.company_name, hd.domain_url, hd.sso_type_code, hd.sso_server_url, hd.sso_login_url, hd.sso_logout_url, hd.sso_client_id, hd.sso_client_pwd, hd.sso_user_info, hd.saml_meta_url, hd.client_host_url, hd.login_name_field, hd.object_version_number FROM hiam_domain hd JOIN hpfm_tenant ht ON hd.tenant_id = ht.tenant_id JOIN hpfm_tenant_tl httl ON ht.tenant_id = httl.tenant_id AND httl.lang = #{lang} LEFT JOIN hpfm_company hc ON hd.company_id = hc.company_id WHERE 1=1
AND hd.domain_id = #{domainId}
